property.name: nifi.install_dir
property.description: Local dir where to install component. NiFi folder will be created as a subdir of this dir e.g. /opt/nifi-0.6.0

property.name: nifi.initial_mem
property.description: Initial memory allocation for NiFi JVM (Xms)

property.name: nifi.max_mem
property.description: Max memory allocation for Nifi JVM (Xmx)

property.name: nifi.setup_prebuilt
property.description: If false, latest Nifi will be built from source. Otherwise a prebuilt version of 0.3.0 will be downloaded

property.name: nifi.ambari_reporting_frequency
property.description: Frequency with which Nifi metrics will be reported to Ambari Metrics. Only used during initial install of service. Post-install this can be reconfigured from Nifi UI under Controller Settings
